trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnStateChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnStateChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnStateChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnStateChanged" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the value of one of the following column properties changes for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado quando o valor de uma das seguintes propriedades de coluna é alterado para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
